value.name: Meghan and Harry aren’t stupid, so why do they keep making the same mistakes?
value.description: The Sussexes are a bright couple. They quit royal life to become financially independent. And yet they don’t seem brave enough to quit the vestiges of that royal life. The coat of arms and the titles are, they have surely come to realise, their unique selling point. Thus they are caught in something of a cleft stick.

value.name: Karl Jenkins’ best works: the Welsh composer’s most beautiful pieces of music
value.description: The Welsh composer’s musical output has been extraordinarily wide-ranging. While he is now best-known for his choral music, with his works like Adiemus and The Armed Man entering the repertoire of choirs worldwide, Sir Karl had his beginnings in jazz, prog rock and advertising music.

value.name: Meghan Markle 'unfurled confidently in the spotlight' as film crew followed Sussexes' trip to Canada - but Prince Harry 'still looks like a slightly troubled camera performer ...
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex spent Valentine's Day in Whistler, Canada, promoting the next Invictus Games while being followed by a film crew.

value.name: Meghan Markle’s £235 Calvin Klein puffer coat has already sold out– but we’ve found a £38 alternative
value.description: Meghan Markle embraced snow bunny chic during her trip to Canada in a £235 Calvin Klein puffer coat which immediately sold out, but we’ve found a £38 version in the John Lewis sale

video.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle visit ski resort in Canada

value.name: Meghan Markle solves mystery of missing £140k engagement ring on Canada trip
value.description: Meghan Markle has been spotted wearing her sparkling engagement ring for the first time in nine months in Whistler, Canada.

value.name: Confusion mounts over whether Meghan Markle is wearing Princess Diana’s £18,000 watch
value.description: In a newly released promotional image of Meghan Markle, royal enthusiasts are unsure if the Duchess is actually wearing Princess Diana's original timepiece or her own.

value.name: Meghan and Harry aren’t stupid, so why do they keep making the same mistakes?
value.description: The Sussexes are a bright couple. They quit royal life to become financially independent. And yet they don’t seem brave enough to quit the vestiges of that royal life. The coat of arms and the titles are, they have surely come to realise, their unique selling point. Thus they are caught in something of a cleft stick.

value.name: Karl Jenkins’ best works: the Welsh composer’s most beautiful pieces of music
value.description: The Welsh composer’s musical output has been extraordinarily wide-ranging. While he is now best-known for his choral music, with his works like Adiemus and The Armed Man entering the repertoire of choirs worldwide, Sir Karl had his beginnings in jazz, prog rock and advertising music.

value.name: Meghan Markle's ultra-chic coat is from a label that cool-girls can't get enough of
value.description: The Duchess of Sussex wore a brand loved by Selena Gomez, Taylor Swift and Kylie Jenner, to a pre-Invictus Games 2025 event

value.name: Royal news – live: Harry and Meghan hit ski slopes at Invictus Games as Charles returns from cancer treatment
value.description: Harry founded the Paralympic-style sporting competition in 2014 for injured and sick veterans to aid their recovery. It comes as King Charles returned from the capital to Sandringham after having his latest bout of cancer treatment and was pictured smiling with the Queen arriving at Clarence House.

video.name: King Charles waves to well-wishers in first public outing since cancer diagnosis

value.name: Meghan Markle's cheeky nod to Canada and her 'special' web designers in statement
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex have rebranded their website - and it seems Meghan Markle knew who should design it.

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle break 64-year royal tradition with children's new names
value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry were all smiles as they held hands while launching the Invictus Games in Vancouver - as it was revealed their children have been given a new surname, ending a 64-year tr

value.name: Meghan and Harry's 'simple' reason for changing kids' surnames
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex have rebranded their website to "unify" their family. The move coincides with the children starting to use the Sussex title.

value.name: Meghan Markle responds to Sussex website backlash as Harry tries sit-skiing in Canada
value.description: Meghan Markle praised the “attention to detail” and “creativity and care” of the designers, after critics pointed out the couple were told to drop use of HRH when they quit as working royals. Even their use of the title Sussex was debated at Buckingham Palace.

about.name: Prince Augustus Frederick, Duke of Sussex

value.name: Meghan Markle beams with pride as she takes snap of Prince Harry on slopes 'to show the kids'
value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are getting ready for next year's Invictus Games with a trip to Vancouver and the Sussexes have been busy spending time on the slopes

video.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle visit Canadian ski resort

value.name: Meghan Markle Goes High-low in Calvin Klein Maxi Puffer Jacket and Cashmere in Vancouver With Prince Harry on Valentine’s Day
value.description: Markle has adopted quiet luxury as her personal style, often wearing minimalist and monochromatic pieces for her public appearances. On Jan. 24, she wore an all-black Carolina Herrera look at the premiere of “ Bob Marley: One Love ” in Kingston, Jamaica. For Variety Power of Women 2023 in November, she donned a beige Proenza Schouler dress.

value.name: Harry and Meghan have changed their children’s surnames in Sussex rebrand
value.description: Prince Archie, four, and Princess Lilibet, two, have been known as Archie Sussex and Lilibet Sussex since the King's coronation.

value.name: Harry and Meghan put on defiant display to hit ski slopes after website row
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle hold hands as they reunite in public to promote the Invictus Games in Vancouver, Canada after the Duke of Sussex's solo visit to the UK

value.name: Shock As Royal Author Claims Prince Harry Was 'In Love' With Kate Middleton
value.description: Ingrid Seward suggested that the Duke of Sussex was always there at Kensington Palace because he harboured feelings for his sister-in-law.

value.name: Meghan Markle gets camera-shy for once as she moves crew aside on loved-up Invictus trip with Prince Harry
value.description: MEGHAN Markle appeared uncharacteristically camera-shy as she budged crew aside on her loved-up trip with Prince Harry to promote the Invictus Games. Camera crew were seen getting a little too

value.name: Video: Meghan Markle cheers on as Prince Harry tries sit-skiing
value.description: At an Invictus Games training camp in Whistler - in freezing temperatures around minus four degrees - Harry took a spin on a sit-ski (a seat with a single ski underneath). Sit-skis are used in para alpine skiing at the Paralympics,

value.name: Meghan Markle is perfect for Lemonada’s glossy, girlboss-feminist podcast empire
value.description: The Duchess of Sussex's mic-friendly valley girl tones and generic empowerment language are ideal for a podcast network aiming to 'make life suck less'

value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Cozy Up in Canada on Valentine's Day for Invictus Games Countdown
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex have arrived at the Invictus Games Vancouver Whistler 2025's One Year to Go celebrations
